.. _sphx_glr_auto_examples_2_explain_plot_1_pdp.py:


Partial Dependence Plot 
=====================================

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-10

Experiment initialization and data preparation

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 10-18

.. code-block:: default

    from piml import Experiment
    from piml.models import XGB2Regressor

    exp = Experiment()
    exp.data_loader(data="BikeSharing", silent=True)
    exp.data_summary(feature_exclude=["yr", "mnth", "temp"], silent=True)
    exp.data_prepare(target="cnt", task_type="regression", silent=True)








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 19-20

Train Model

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 20-22

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_train(model=XGB2Regressor(n_estimators=100), name="XGB2")








.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 23-24

1D PDP for hr (use training data by default)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 24-27

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pdp", uni_feature="hr",
                      grid_size=50, original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_pdp_001.png
   :alt: Partial Dependence Plot
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_pdp_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 28-29

1D PDP for hr (use test data)

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 29-32

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pdp", uni_feature="hr", use_test=True,
                      grid_size=50, original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_pdp_002.png
   :alt: Partial Dependence Plot
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_pdp_002.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 33-34

1D PDP for season

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 34-37

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pdp", uni_feature='season',
                      original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))




.. image-sg:: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_pdp_003.png
   :alt: Partial Dependence Plot
   :srcset: /auto_examples/2_explain/images/sphx_glr_plot_1_pdp_003.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 38-39

2D PDP for hr and workingday

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 39-41

.. code-block:: default

    exp.model_explain(model="XGB2", show="pdp", bi_features=["hr", "workingday"],
                      grid_size=10, sample_size=10000, sliced_line=False, original_scale=True, figsize=(5, 4))
